name: Puzzle Fairy Village
description:
Game Puzzle Fairy Village is a  colorful puzzle game. The main objective of the game is to improve a player's skills on solving problems and planning. With the colorful style, this game is suitable for kids at all ages. 

The player works together with faries to go to the new land by solving puzzles. 

This game is designed and developed by Nattawut Klaingkaew. He is a 4th year student at the Department of Interactive Design and Game Development, College of Creative Design and Entertainment Technology, Dhurakij Pundit University.

Developer & Design: Nattawut Klaingkaew

Advisor: Banyapon Poolsawas
